transcript:
Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay pashchat prayas karein. The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again. 
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Ji, ma'am good morning boliye.
Customer: Good morning sir, kaise hain?
Executive: Thik hun, bataiye.
Customer: Haan, actually sir aapne bola tha na ki aaj subah connect karne ke liye, tabhi maine connect kiya hua hai. Bataiye aapko kya problem aa raha tha?
Executive: Problem yeh hai ki Rajendra ji ko jante hain aap?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Aapke account manager honge pehle?
Executive: Rajendra ji actually humko IndiaMART pe connect kiye the.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Awaz actually aa nahi rahi aapki sahi se.
Customer: Haan ji, haan sir aa rahi hai, bataiye aap.
Executive: Toh kehne ka matlab yeh hai ki jisse two month ho gaya.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isme koi response mila nahi, koi lead bhi final nahi hui meri.
Customer: Thik hai, pehle toh main aapko dekhiye aapko koi aadmi bola hoga, bataya hoga ki kis purpose se aapne mujhe call kiya, yeh toh aapko subject malum hoga na?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Toh aapko jab sab pata hai toh aap uska solution kya bata rahe hain, yeh bataiye.
Customer: Sir dekhiye abhi na aapne 96 pe complaint raise kiya hua tha, thik hai? Toh tabhi maine connect kiya. Usse pehle maine kai baar connect karne ki koshish ki but wahan se mujhe response nahi mil raha tha company side se. Is wajah se meri koi conversation nahi ho paayi thi.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Thik hai, maan liya, thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai. Second thing sir jo Rajendra sir ki aap baat kar rahe ho woh field sales ke bande the, thik hai? Unhone sirf aapko sales kari hai, jo bhi aap se commitment kiya aap woh mujhe pehle bataiye, phir main aapko saari cheeze wahan pe solution karke deti hun. Aur second thing ab boliye, boliye, boliye, boliye. Ab sir, ab sir aapka account jo hai, aapki company jo hai woh Noida head office 135 se pura allocate ho rahi hai, thik hai? Toh ab jo rahega woh aapko yahan pe baat karni rahegi. Abhi yeh company mere paas mein hai, mere under pe hai, toh main hi account handle karungi. Toh aage se koi bhi problem rahega aap mere se hi baat karoge, thik hai?
Customer: Ab suniye, suniye ab main to the point zyada main waqt nahi hai mere paas. Ab main aapko to the point bata raha hun.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Unhone, unhone yeh shuru karaya tha kaam.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Do, do mahina pehle ki aap aise aise aap kaam shuru kijiye, aapko response milega, lead milegi, business hoga, thik hai?
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Bihar se, Bihar se. Ab kya hai ki Bihar se jitne bhi lead aaye.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Woh ekdum low quantity mein.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Low quantity jaise maan lijiye ki 10 piece, 20 piece, 50 piece aise aa raha hai. Distance hai wahan se 50 kilometer, 100 kilometer toh woh bekar ho gaya, woh bhej nahi sakte hum wahan pe maal.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Aur jisme quantity zyada hai woh phir distance hai, woh out of state hai, woh UP hai, aapka Noida hai, aapka Delhi hai, aapka Kolkata hai aise aa raha hai. Toh dono hisab se, dono taraf se yeh problem yeh hua ki overall business mujhe ₹1 ka bhi nahi mila. Toh maine yeh kal bola tha, parso wahan complaint kiya tha ki yeh jo aapne 37,000 ka aapne jo salana fix kiya hai isko main, isko main hold karunga. Ab do mahina ho gaya isko main kyunki jab response nahi hai toh kaam ka paisa dalne ka koi fayda nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi sir, aisa nahi hai but haan yeh main bol sakti hun ki unhone dobara se aapko guidance nahi diya ki kaise kaam karna hai.
Customer: Nahi kiya. Aaj main teen, teen din se aaj main phone kar raha hun. Woh baat nahi kar rahe hain, yeh sabse, yeh sabse galat baat hai, yeh aap unko message de dijiyega.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul sir, yeh main abhi aapko connect karungi.
Customer: Aapko, aapko jab, aapko jab kaam shuru karna tha toh aap din bhar mein 10 call karte the.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur aaj mujhe zarurat hai aapko baat karne ka toh aapko aaj time nahi mil raha toh main isko band kar dunga. Main bank se bhi.
Executive: Woh isliye na sir, main bata deti hun. Woh isliye na sir ki abhi unke paas mein company hai nahi toh na woh effort nahi karna chahte hain. Matlab unko jitna kaam tha unhone apni cheeze karke wahan se.
Customer: Toh chalo band, band toh kiya ja sakta hai na ma'am? Band toh kiya ja sakta hai na?
Executive: Main iske liye, main iske liye ek bari unke against company mein bolungi aur complaint raise kar dungi. Toh woh khud already aapko ya connect karein ya mujhe karein, main unse is bare mein baat zarur karungi. Second thing aapko.
Customer: Aap keval yeh bol, aapke, haan boliye bataiye.
Executive: Aap iske liye pareshan mat hoiye. Main aapko dobara se saari cheeze point to point guide karti hun aur aage se aap use kariye acche se aur koi bhi problem aati hai aap mujhe message drop kariye, thik hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi, mera yeh kehna hai ki aap wahan se, aap wahan se Noida se aur Delhi se aap mere ko keval suggest karenge aur mera yahan paisa kat raha hai har month mein.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, suggest karenge na dekho aap saari cheeze karna.
Customer: Karna, karna aap wahan se kar rahe ho aur mera kaam jab nahi ho raha hai toh main lastly kya karunga, kaam ko band karunga na?
Executive: Right.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir, main aapse abhi connect hui hun, aap mujhe thoda time do, main pehle jaise jis tarah se aapko guide karti hun us tarah se aap use kariye, definitely aapko business milega kyunki yeh joda gaya hai business ke.
Customer: Main jab, main jab Rajendra ji ko yeh bola tha ki mujhe keval proper Bihar jo ki 38 district hai yahan pe humko keval Bihar ke liye, haan haan thik hai keval Bihar ke liye aapko mil jayega kaam, yeh hai woh hai. Abhi tak kuch bhi matlab, matlab agar mera ko yeh aap samajh lijiye ki 3400 yeh per month yeh deduct ho raha hai na toh main ₹34 ka abhi tak business nahi kiya hun main. Toh main kyun, main kyun, kyun dalunga paisa usme?
Executive: Right sir, main aapki baat bilkul samajh pa rahi hun, kahin na kahin problem aaya hai is wajah se aap request cancel bhi karna chahte hain but main aapko ek baar dobara se guide karti hun, aap mujhe pehle kuch cheeze bata dijiye ki aap kis tarah se business kar rahe ho toh hyper locally aap business kar rahe ho, sir Bihar hi dekhte hain, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh pura Bihar cover karte hain ya usme bhi criteria rahega aapka?
Customer: Nahi nahi, pura Bihar.
Executive: Bihar mein kahin bhi agar lead accha mil jayega mujhe toh main kar sakta hun.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur second cheez yeh sir ki aapka minimum order quantity ke liye bhi aapne bola ki bahut chhoti lead humko provide hoti hai Bihar mein jab hum search karte hain toh aap bata dijiye mujhe ki kitna minimum order quantity rehna chahiye aapko?
Customer: Agar, agar amount wise bhi baat karenge hum toh kam se kam, kam se kam 30 to 40,000 minimum.
Executive: 30 to 40,000.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Thik hai. Main maan ke chalti hun agar, agar main, agar main itna hoga tab toh mujhe kuch usme matlab fayda aayega na?
Executive: Main samajh rahi hun sir, main ispe kaam karke dekhti hun aapko. Thik hai, baki saari cheezon mein bhi main guide karti hun jahan problem aayega aap mujhe bataiyega. Aap mujhe ek cheez aur bataiye dekhiye do cheeze clear ho gayi. Ab teesri cheez mujhe yeh bataiye jaise aapke product hai jo plastic water jug, stainless steel spoon, stainless steel fork yeh saare product mein aap deal karte ho. Iske alawa koi aur bhi product hai jisme aap deal karna chahte hain ya abhi tak added nahi hua hai?
Customer: Haan, kuch aur hai but usko maine add nahi kiya abhi. Main add karunga usko.
Executive: Aap apni side se ek bari quotation le lijiyega.
Customer: Lekin ma'am main add kyun karu jab itne ka response nahi mila toh main dusra cheez add kya karunga?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, aap dekhiye aap jitna number of product apna increase karoge na dekhiye sir paise lag gaye hain, thik hai? Ab aap usko main agar bol rahi hun aapko resolution provide kar rahi hun toh kuch soch ke hi kar rahi hongi aur main literally aap trust kariye aap meri screen pe team viewer connect karke bhi dekh sakte hain maine bahut baar try kiya aapko baat karne ke liye but meri baat nahi ho pa rahi thi. Even aaj subah bhi maine aapke primary number pe call kiya tha but phir se woh not reachable aa raha tha toh phir maine yeh number ab mujhe mil gaya hai toh main usko wapas se call kar rahi hun, thik hai? Aap second cheez pe aate hain ki main in dono cheezon pe kaam karke dekhti hun aapko aur yeh jo using hoti hai main aapke pata hai aapko services se kitni leads provide hoti hain?
Customer: Ji, per day?
Executive: Per day aur per week kitni total kitni leads aapko milti hain?
Customer: Mere ko lag raha hai shayad seven hai.
Executive: Nahi sir dekhiye aapka jo base services chal rahi hai woh services ka naam hai mini dynamic catalog, thik hai? Yeh ek base service hoti hai aur isme hota kya hai ki aapko 10 leads per week milti hai aur one lead per bonus daily basis pe milti hai.
Customer: Ma'am maan liya, maan liya chalo woh bhi maan liya.
Executive: Haan. Nahi nahi, main aapko solution bata rahi hun, bas aap meri baat suniye pehle. Toh 17 lead aapko milti hai, thik hai? Per week. Toh ab aap isko purchase pattern mein agar set karoge toh usko kis tarah se use karna hai aapko woh main pehle bata deti hun ki per day ka aapko do se teen lead aapko daily purchase karni hai, thik hai?
Customer: Hmm, thik hai.
Executive: Sir aap woh product apna choose kar sakte ho jaise aaj maine plastic water jug ki ek lead li hai, hand chopper ki ek lead li hai Bihar ki, stainless steel spoon ki ek lead li hai. Ab hum yeh teeno ka bifurcation kaise karenge? Toh uske liye aap jab apna seller panel login karte ho aur buyleads pe jaate ho tab wahan pe aapko filters milte hain, thik hai? Maine wahan se filter use kar rahi hun Bihar ka aur second main filter use kar rahi hun apne product category ka hand chopper ka, thik hai? Phir wahan pe mujhe kuch lead mil rahi hain jo kuch quantity kam hai unki, thik hai? 50 pieces ki hai, minimum do pieces ki hai, five pieces ki hai, thik hai? Toh ab yahan se humko order quantity ka value ek baar laga ke dekhiye.
Customer: Hmm. Thik hai.
Customer: Ab aage kya karna hai yeh bataiye mujhe, chaliye.
Executive: Main aapko batati hun jis tarah se aap us tarah se use karna start kariye.
Executive: Thik hai. Aap bata dijiye pehle mujhe ki aap hi use karoge ya phir aapke koi account manager wagera woh use karenge?
Customer: Nahi nahi, main hun aur mera beta hai, do aadmi use karte hain hum log.
Executive: Thik hai, no issue sir. Main aapko ek bari video meet pe connect kar lu taaki main aapko saari cheeze ek ek point to point dikha ke samjha saku kaise karna hai.
Customer: Nahi toh ab, abhi nahi, abhi woh hai nahi, woh jab rahega sath mein phir aap karna. Main aapko call kar dunga kareeb ek, ek aur 2 baje ke beech mein.
Executive: No issue sir, aap jab bhi available hoiyega aap ek bari message drop kar lijiyega ya phir call kar lijiyega. Main aapko apne number se personal jo mera number hai usse ek bari aapko WhatsApp pe hi karti hun toh aap woh number save kar lena, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai, bhej dijiye ussi pe main aapse sampark mein rahunga main, bhej dijiye.
Executive: Thik, thik hai sir.
Customer: Okay, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- No response or final leads in two months.

- Leads from Bihar are low quantity.

- Distance is an issue for higher quantity leads.

- No business generated despite subscription fees.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive will address the complaint with Rajendra.

- Executive offered guidance on using the platform.

- Executive will share her contact number on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to connect with Rajendra regarding the issue.

- Customer will receive contact details via WhatsApp.

- Customer will call back to schedule a video meet.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, bihar, quantity, distance
